q: Which variables are visible to a child module?
choices: Only variables explicitly passed into it
All variables in the root module
Any variable declared in variables.tf
All variables from other child modules
explain: Child modules only see variables explicitly passed in their module block.

q: How can a child module receive sensitive variables?
choices: Mark the variable as sensitive in the root module
Pass it normally; Terraform automatically encrypts it
Mark the variable as sensitive in the child module variables.tf
You cannot pass sensitive variables to child modules
explain: To handle sensitive variables, mark them as sensitive in the child module's variable definition.
